originalShowTitle: 日々は過ぎれど飯うまし
overview: Follow the daily lives of five new undergrad college girls as the eat, laugh, and deepen their friendships. They love delicious, want to have lots of fun together, study hard, and enjoy their college life to the fullest!

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E01.mkv
1.episodeTitle: Welcome to the Food Culture Research Club
1.episodeOverview: University student Mako Kawai lives a quiet life. Then one day, she's unexpectedly invited to join a club.

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E02.mkv
1.episodeOverview: Mako and the others are told they must hold an activity to show what their club is about or be disbanded!

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E03.mkv
1.episodeOverview: Mako and the others decide to go out together on the weekend, but then Shinon's money for the trip disappears!

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E04.mkv
1.episodeOverview: Mako accidentally bumps into a scary girl after German class. Later, that same girl shows up at the club room!

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E05.mkv
1.episodeTitle: Want to Go for a Drive?
1.episodeOverview: Kurea and Shinon get their licenses, so the club decides to go for a drive... but they end up on the freeway!

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E06.mkv
1.episodeTitle: Could It Be I’ve Gained Some Weight?
1.episodeOverview: The club goes out for a day of shopping. When Mako tries on a skirt, she's shocked to find it doesn't fit!

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E07.mkv
1.episodeTitle: I Don't Think I'll Ever Forget
1.episodeOverview: The club trip begins! After the train and sightseeing, they plan to use the outdoor oven. But then, it rains!

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E08.mkv
1.episodeOverview: Nana spots her escaped pet in the worst location. Then, one hot day, the club's air conditioner won't turn on!

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E09.mkv
1.episodeOverview: The club decides to have a food stall at the university fair, which means Nana will have to help customers!

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E10.mkv
1.episodeOverview: The club takes a trip to Mako and Shinon's hometown. Mako is nervous about meeting her old friends again.

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E11.mkv
1.episodeOverview: Three of the club members study late and get locked in the building! Later, the club plans a Christmas party.

1.fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E12.mkv
1.episodeOverview: The club gathers to give their clubroom a New Year's cleaning. They reminisce and enter the new year together!
